DOC.criteria: Healthy Japanese male age ≥20 ≤40 year age Clinically normal physical finding laboratory value judge investigator include negative test Hepatitis B surface antigen , antibody HIV virus antibody Hepatitis C virus Clinically significant illness clinically relevant trauma , judge investigator , within two week first administration IP History psychiatric somatic disease/condition may interfere objective study , judge investigator .
